text: Saint-Josse-ten-Node (; usually shortened to Saint-Josse) or Sint-Joost-ten- Node () is a municipality in the Brussels-Capital Region in Belgium. It is the smallest municipality by area in Belgium. In 2007, 23,785 people lived there. It is at 50° 51 North, 04° 22 East. ==References== ==Other websites== * Saint- Josse-ten-Noode Category:Municipalities of Brussels-Capital Region
title: Saint-Josse-ten-Noode
